full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer: Acquisition of Bolts
### Tender Identification
| **Field**                                      | **Value**                                    |
| -----------------------------------------------------| -------------------------------------------- |
| Tender Title (English)                           | Request for Standing Offer: Acquisition of Bolts  |
| Tender Title (French)                            | Demande d'offre à commandes: Acquisition de boulons |
| Reference Number                                  | WS3901371503-Doc4568603498                  |
| Solicitation Number                               | WS3901371503                                 |
| Publication Date                                   | May 3, 2024                                     |
| Tender Closing Date                               | June 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT                    |
| Amendment Date                                    | June 21, 2024                                  |
| Tender Status (English)                          | Expired                                       |
| Tender Status (French)                           | Expiré                                         |

### Request Details
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a request for standing offers (RFSO) for the acquisition of bolts. This RFSO supersedes previous RFSO number W1985-23A001 dated August 23, 2023.

* Delivery location: Montreal
* Period of Standing Offer: 2 years, with an option to extend for 1 year under the same terms and conditions.

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, contact:

Corine Lavoie
Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC)/Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc
